channel.title: [525] Changing Client IP, Will Rep for help [525]
channel.description:
Well my 525 client ip is set as 127.0.0.1 and i know you have to change the ip in like, 3 different spots for a 525 client. Ive changed it in client.java but idk where else to change it. The client im using is DannySkape 525 client. If anyone can help me ill rep them. Thanks
Error i get when i try to run:
[URL=http://img34.imageshack.us/i/failzscapez.png/][IMG]http://img34.imageshack.us/img34/4588/failzscapez.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: [525] Changing Client IP, Will Rep for help [525]
item.dc:creator: @arbat arbat
item.description:
@arbat wrote:

Go to loader.java and search for ip there, change it to whatever you want then compile

Read full topic
item.source: [525] Changing Client IP, Will Rep for help [525]

item.title: [525] Changing Client IP, Will Rep for help [525]
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

I dont have a gui or Egui. Remember its a 525 client not a 317.

Read full topic
item.source: [525] Changing Client IP, Will Rep for help [525]

item.title: [525] Changing Client IP, Will Rep for help [525]
item.dc:creator: @king_gauge king gauge
item.description:
@king_gauge wrote:

Well, where was it connecting in the client.java? Make sure you search for the previous ip and run the server before starting up the client. Then make sure you checked the GUI.java or EGUI.java. There should be one in there.

Read full topic
item.source: [525] Changing Client IP, Will Rep for help [525]
